lead_paragraph: Shaun White won his third consecutive halfpipe title at the United States Open Snowboarding Championships in Stratton, Vt., executing a series of near-flawless runs. White beat out Kevin Pearce and Mason Aguirre. Torah Bright took top honors in the women’s division, besting the three-time champion Kelly Clark.
